page.title: 05A23 TRUNK ROAD
page.content: The Sussex Police conducted a traffic count during March 1985 at Sayers Common, incorporating north and south bound traffic. These figures remain fairly constant throughout the year. Northbound 0100_0200 28 vehicles 0700_ 0800 1356 vehicles, Southbound 0300_ 0400 17 vehicles 1700_1800 1392 vehi_ cles. The busiest period is between June and September, with peak traffic throughout the main holiday months of July and August. 31 vehicles were involved in accidents in 1984 of which 10 were private motorcars, the highest single group of road users. The age groups of the drivers involved are as follows_ Age 20,4_Age 30,9_Age 40,7_ Age 50,4_Age 60,3_Age 80,1_Unknown,3_ 2 pedestrians were involved in 1983/84 and there were 2 accidents involving police vehicles, 3 accidents resulted in death, and 12 in hospital treatment
